item.title: Chest tele and item
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

First open your client.java and press ctrl+f Search for Case 6:

Right above case 6: add this.
Code:

[code]

= the object id.

@@@@ = the item id you wish toget from the object.
***** = the amount of the item you wish to recieve.[/code]

Heres a test code we will try.
Code:

case 356: // crate addItem(995, 1); break;

Save your client.java and put a crate on the map and see if you click it and get an item

Now we can make this more complex if you know what i mean.
Press ctrl f to search.
open your client.java and search for case 356:

Above that add this

case object id: // description if(HasItemAmount(item amount to recieve item, the amount of the item needed to recieve a new item)) { addItem(the item to be given, the amount of the item to be given); deleteItem(the item to be deleted, GetItemSlot(the item slot), the amout of item to be deleted); } else { sendMessage("Put your message here."); } break;

Lets try a test. search for case 356:

Add above thatâ€¦

case 357: // crate if(HasItemAmount(995, 1)) { addItem(1115, 1); deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 1); } else { sendMessage("you need a coin first"); } break;

Save it compile then run your done.
